settings.title: Healthcare Partnerships
settings.sub_title: Expanding healthcare partnerships and delivery systems:
settings.sub_content: We are always looking for new healthcare partners to grow our delivery systems including hospitals, respiratory clinics, physician offices, and pharmacies. We welcome new retail opportunities to drive patient point of use and welcome all resale inquiries.
settings.sub_sec_content:
• Wholesale case rates.
  • Full refund & return policy.
  • Same day shipping available upon request.
  • High-impact retail packaging complete with instructions.
settings.sub_third_content:
• Library of health resources, editorials, and published medical reports.
  • Point of purchase brochures available.
  • Catalog kits with text and photograph samples.

settings.title: If you would like more information on our full product line and services including product knowledge seminars, continuing medical education (CME), product training, wholesale pricing, and product availability please contact:
